title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated pecorino cheese.
Toss the pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Add the egg and cheese mixture and stir quickly to combine.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for 4 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry onions until golden, then add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
